commandDescription: print a greeting and your org IDs
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
macroDeveloperName: (required) developer name of the macro to pull
retrievetargetdir: (required) directory root for the retrieved files
retrieveType: (required) type of macro retrieve. Either list or all.
targetMacros: (optional) list of macros to be retrieved. Required if the retrieveType is "list"
